name: LoopTrix!
description:
This game was developed for a client (Playlant by Gabriel Camapana).

Your mission is to make loops with tens of different pieces. The bigger the loops, the more points you can get. You start with a random piece. Move, rotate and place it where you like. But be careful, the grid is not unlimited and you never know which piece will come next. Test your brain with this fascinating casual puzzle.

Game engine: Unity3D
